story: As you tiptoe through the dimly lit corridors, you come across a group of cyborg rats skittering about. What do you do?

actions.action: Shoot at the cyborg rats with your laser pistol
actions.good: Your accuracy pays off as you expertly eliminate the mechanical menace. You discover a collection of valuable cybernetic parts which you salvage.
actions.bad: The sound of gunfire draws unwanted attention, and a group of cyborg henchmen materialize. You take damage from their retaliatory attacks.

actions.action: Lure the cyborg rats into a trap
actions.good: Your cunning strategy allows you to catch the cyborg rats in an electrified net. You salvage valuable components from their defeated bodies.
actions.bad: As you lure the cyborg rats into your trap, a group of cybernetic bats swoop down and attack. You take damage from their sharp talons.

actions.good: You wisely avoid confrontation with the cyborg rats, allowing you to pass through undetected. As a reward, you stumble upon a secret cache of cybernetic components.
actions.bad: As you attempt to sneak past the cyborg rats, you accidentally trip an alarm. Turrets emerge from the walls and begin firing in your direction. You take damage from their relentless attacks.
